messages.content: Chinese slogans for Mid-autumn festival about home or furniture

1. "家居美好，倍添团圆" (Jiājū měihǎo, bèi tiān tuán yuán) - "Beautiful homes, multiplying the feeling of reunion"
2. "家，更添月圆情" (Jiā, gèng tiān yuè yuán qíng) - "Homes, enhancing the feeling of a full moon"
3. "温馨家居，圆满团圆" (Wēn xīn jiājū, yuánmǎn tuányuán) - "Cozy homes, a complete reunion"
4. "家居装饰，让团圆更温暖" (Jiājū zhuāngshì, ràng tuányuán gèng wēnnuǎn) - "Home decoration, making reunion warmer"
5. "家，是心灵的港湾" (Jiā, shì xīnlíng de gǎngwān) - "Home, the harbor of the soul"
6. "居家团圆，福满人间" (Jūjiā tuányuán, fú mǎn rénjiān) - "Reunion at home, blessings fill the world"
7. "家居和谐，团圆美满" (Jiājū héxié, tuányuán měimǎn) - "Harmonious homes, perfect reunion"
8. "家，爱与团圆的永恒之地" (Jiā, ài yǔ tuányuán de yǒnghéng zhī dì) - "Home, the eternal place of love and reunion"
9. "团聚在家，幸福绵长" (Tuánjù zài jiā, xìngfú miáncháng) - "Gathering at home, long-lasting happiness"
10. "家中团圆，幸福倍增" (Jiā zhōng tuányuán, xìngfú bèi zēng) - "Reunion at home, multiplying happiness"
can you give me more examples?

Certainly! Here are some more examples of Chinese slogans for Mid-autumn festival related to home or furniture:

1. "家的味道，月圆情浓" (Jiā de wèidào, yuè yuán qíng nóng) - "The taste of home, intensified with the full moon"
2. "温馨居家，幸福满月" (Wēn xīn jūjiā, xìngfú mǎn yuè) - "Cozy homes, full of happiness with the full moon"
3. "家居装饰，传递团圆之爱" (Jiājū zhuāngshì, chuándì tuányuán zhī ài) - "Home decoration, spreading the love of reunion"
4. "家，孕育幸福的月圆巢" (Jiā, yùnyù xìngfú de yuè yuán cháo) - "Home, the nest where happiness blooms with the full moon"
5. "家是最美的月光" (Jiā shì zuìměi de yuèguāng) - "Home is the most beautiful moonlight"
6. "团圆乐购，家装幸福" (Tuányuán lègòu, jiāzhuāng xìngfú) - "Reunion shopping, home decoration brings happiness"
7. "富贵团圆，家居共享" (Fùguì tuányuán, jiājū gòngxiǎng) - "Wealthy reunion, sharing home together"
8. "月圆家庭，幸福连连" (Yuè yuán jiātíng, xìngfú lián lián) - "Full moon family, endless happiness"
9. "精心布置，家庭团圆" (Jīngxīn bùzhì, jiātíng tuányuán) - "Careful arrangement, family reunion"
10. "家装美观，团圆更加欢愉" (Jiāzhuāng měiguān, tuányuán gèngjiā huānyú) - "Beautiful home decoration, more joyful reunion"

I hope these examples inspire you!

Certainly! Here are more examples of Chinese slogans for Mid-autumn festival related to home or furniture:

1. "家居温馨，月色相伴" (Jiājū wēnxīn, yuè sè xiāngbàn) - "Cozy home, accompanied by the moonlight"
2. "团圆之家，幸福点亮" (Tuányuán zhī jiā, xìngfú diǎn liàng) - "Home of reunion, illuminated by happiness"
3. "家是最美的月亮" (Jiā shì zuìměi de yuèliàng) - "Home is the most beautiful moon"
4. "温馨家居，共度中秋" (Wēnxīn jiājū, gòng dù Zhōngqiū) - "Cozy home, celebrating Mid-autumn together"
5. "家是圆满的小宇宙" (Jiā shì yuánmǎn de xiǎo yǔzhòu) - "Home is a complete small universe"
6. "装点家园，月夜更浪漫" (Zhuāngdiǎn jiāyuán, yuèyè gèng làngmàn) - "Decorate your home, more romantic nights under the moonlight"
7. "家是幸福的归宿" (Jiā shì xìngfú de guīsù) - "Home is the happy destination"
8. "共享家庭团圆的甜蜜" (Gòngxiǎng jiātíng tuányuán de tiánmì) - "Share the sweetness of family reunion"
9. "家居装饰，增添团圆喜庆" (Jiājū zhuāngshì, zēngtiān tuányuán xǐqìng) - "Home decoration, adding joy to the reunion celebration"
10. "以家为中心，团圆盛典" (Yǐ jiā wéi zhōngxīn, tuányuán shèngdiǎn) - "With home as the center, a grand celebration of reunion"

I hope you find these examples helpful!
Any Chinese slogans about home or furniture for Thanksgiving Day?

Certainly! Here are some Chinese slogans about home or furniture for Thanksgiving Day:

1. "感恩之心，家的温暖" (Gǎn'ēn zhī xīn, jiā de wēnnuǎn) - "A grateful heart, the warmth of home"
2. "家，是感恩的起点" (Jiā, shì gǎn'ēn de qǐdiǎn) - "Home, the starting point of gratitude"
3. "家具，见证感恩时刻" (Jiājù, jiànzhèng gǎn'ēn shíkè) - "Furniture, witnessing moments of gratitude"
4. "感恩装点，家庭幸福" (Gǎn'ēn zhuāngdiǎn, jiātíng xìngfú) - "Decoration of gratitude, family happiness"
5. "家是感恩的港湾" (Jiā shì gǎn'ēn de gǎngwān) - "Home is the harbor of gratitude"
6. "家具的力量，传递感恩" (Jiājù de lìliàng, chuándì gǎn'ēn) - "The power of furniture, spreading gratitude"
7. "感恩时刻，家装更幸福" (Gǎn'ēn shíkè, jiāzhuāng gèng xìngfú) - "Moments of gratitude, happier home decoration"
8. "家，感恩的见证" (Jiā, gǎn'ēn de jiànzhèng) - "Home, the witness of gratitude"
9. "感恩的心，铺就幸福家庭" (Gǎn'ēn de xīn, pūjiù xìngfú jiātíng) - "A grateful heart, paving the way for a happy family"
10. "庆感恩日，回家温暖" (Qìng gǎn'ēn rì, huí jiā wēnnuǎn) - "Celebrating Thanksgiving Day, returning to a warm home"

I hope these slogans capture the spirit of gratitude for Thanksgiving Day!
